author: noreply@blogger.com (dinesh prabhu)
title: Govt Teachers Jobs 2017, School Teacher Jobs (27037 Vacancies Opening)
text:
Last Updated Monday, January 23, 2017 Advertisement 
Teachers Jobs for Primary / Secondary / High Secondary Government Schools Recruitment Vacancies listed in this page. Most of the State Government Education Board conducting mandatory entrance examination of Teacher Eligibility Test (TET) for recruiting qualified Teachers in Government / Govt Aided schools from Class 1 to Class 8. Teaching jobs 2016-17 in government schools from 1st Standard to 12th Standard listed on the following Table. 
Educational Qualification: Diploma in Education / B.Ed (Bachelor of Education) / M.Ed (Master of Education).
